words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English sphalerite). Contains the suffix -iitti.

categories: Finnish terms derived from New Latin

forms.form: Rare. Only used with substantive adjectives.

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English spheroid). Adapted with the adjectival suffix + -inen.

categories: Finnish terms derived from Ancient Greek

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English sphinx), ultimately from Ancient Greek Σφίγξ (Sphínx).
Internationalism (see English sphragistics). Contains the suffix -iikka.
